page.title: 04Yealmpton Health Centre
page.content: {Yealmpton Health Centre}was purpose built in 1969 for a two doctor practice.In the 16 years since, the population of the area has increased to the extent that, about 8 years ago a third medical practitioner was added It is planned that in 1985 a new extension to the centre will be built. Existing facilities include{Dispensing {Ante Natal Clinics Family planning, {Chiropody,Child development Clinics {Pre-school injections, G.P.Services. The present number of patients is approx. 5300 and the centre covers an area of a 5 mile radius.The staff comprises{3 Doctors}Dr.M.Everitt Dr.R Page Dr.J.Challenor{A Health Visitor Mrs Wilkinson{;A Midwife}Mrs Crispin; {A District Nurse}Mrs Peach;{An {Auxiliary Nurse}Mrs Smerdon{3 Practice {Nurses}Mrs Strachan Mrs Macgregor Mrs Harvey{and 7 Receptionist/Dispensers
